name: filofaxDIY
short_description:
My wife could not buy a filofax personal agenda with one week on 6 pages, in the local shop. So I created a program to produce this on dubbelsided printed paper in the printer. Because I made the software generic and modular, it is also possible to customize the output to your own local language.
Maybe more people in the world want to create their own filofax agenda for the comming year, I release the software to everyone.
summary: Create DIY printable filofax agenda fillings
